abstract: Golfer Tiger Woods says he is finally pain-free after recovering from two back operations; will compete for first time in 15 months at Hero World Challenge, unofficial PGA Tour event hat he hosts in Nassau, Bahamas.

headline.print_headline: With Nerves but No Back Pain, Woods Is Ready to Tee It Up Again
headline.main: Tiger Woods Is Back. He Brought Some Nerves, but Left the Pain at Home.

snippet: Woods, sidelined from competitive golf for 15 months because of a back injury, is set to play in the Hero World Challenge starting Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Woods, sidelined from competitive golf for 15 months because of a back injury, is set to play in the Hero World Challenge starting Thursday.
